The '''Spirit Pearl''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained during the {{Quest|The Moon-Bathed Deep}}. 

It is used during the {{Quest|"Heart of Watatsumi"}} to unlock the seal to the "heart" in order to open the entrance to [[Enkanomiya]].
